'''Donald Burke''' is the father of [[Preston Burke]].

==History==
He came with [[Jane Burke|his wife]] to [[Seattle Grace Hospital]] to see [[Preston Burke|his son]] while he was recovering from a gunshot wound. He and his wife walked in on [[Cristina Yang]] giving [[Preston Burke|Burke]] a striptease. His reaction was shock. He had also brought flowers for Burke. Later, when he saw that Cristina was discouraged after Burke's mother didn't like her, he told her to hang in there.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
====[[Jane Burke]]====
Donald is married to [[Jane Burke]] and they have one son, [[Preston Burke]].

===Familial===
====[[Preston Burke]]====
He has one son, Preston. He doesn't seem to be as protective over his son as his wife. When Cristina became discouraged because Jane didn't like her, he told her to hang in there.
